channel.title: Tech Debt
channel.description: The more you delay reinventing the wheels, the worse programmer you become

item.description:

‚Ä¢ TypeScript excess property checks ‚Ä¢ Enums vs object literals ‚Ä¢ Structural vs duck typing ‚Ä¢ TS compiler edge cases ‚Ä¢ WTFs that break your mental model ‚Ä¢ Type-level math ‚Ä¢ Performance debugging hell ‚Ä¢ Massive monorepo pain points ‚Ä¢ The one TypeScript bug Prime can‚Äôt let go
